{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_M_FireMissile}} '''A_M_FireMissile'''
(no parameters)
Does nothing if the calling actor has no valid target. If it has a target that is within melee range, calls [[A_M_Punch]](1) instead of doing anything else. Otherwise, calls [[A_FaceTarget]] and fires a {{Class|Rocket}}. This replicates {{Class|RocketLauncher}} [[A_FireMissile|fire]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} and derived classes.
